subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4
msgSnippet: On Fri, 17 Jun 2005 08:10:35 -0500, Simon Chappell ... Simon, Us Mac folks can find J2SE 5 here:  http://developer.apple.com/java/. Since I haven t needed it
messageBody:
On Fri, 17 Jun 2005 08:10:35 -0500, "Simon Chappell"
<simonpeterchappell@...> said:
> And don't forget the folks in corporate employment with STANDARDS that
> say they must use exactly 1.4.2 and who won't see JDK 1.5 for not less
> than a year. And us Mac using folks won't see it until Steve Jobs
> deems it fit for us.
>
> I guess I won't be using JUnit 4 for quite a while yet. :-(

Simon,

Us Mac folks can find J2SE 5 here: http://developer.apple.com/java/.
Since I haven't needed it for anything I'm currently doing, I haven't
yet installed it myself.

Regards,
Craig
